text: Roach's mouse-tailed dormouse (Myomimus roachi), also known as the ground dormouse or mouse-tailed dormouse, is a species of dormouse in the Gliridae family. It is found in Bulgaria, Greece, and Turkey. == Source == * Amori G. 1996. Myomimus roachi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 30 July 2007. Category:Myomimus Category:Mammals of Europe Category:Animals of Turkey
title: Roach's mouse-tailed dormouse
